jacdac.WindDirectionReg.WindDirection:
Read-only ° uint16_t. The direction of the wind.
* ```
const [windDirection] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.WindDirectionReg.WindDirectionErr:
Read-only ° uint16_t. Error on the wind direction reading
* ```
const [windDirectionError] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
modules.WindDirectionClient: A sensor that measures wind direction.
modules.WindDirectionClient.onWindDirect: Run code when the wind direction changes by the given threshold value.
modules.WindDirectionClient.windDirectio: Error on the wind direction reading
